original_title: Маленькие человечки Большевистского переулка, или Хочу пива
overview: Comedy with elements of the absurd about the absurdity of life, unfulfilled dreams and the mysteries of the Russian soul. The unfortunate Bit about that is after he kicked his wife and threw favorite, decided to be a dwarf and live under the gas stove.
title: Little People of the Bolshevik Lane, or I Want Beer
